title: Adding Conditions
intro: FieldLogs embeds a decision engine aimed at providing smarter templates. It dramatically reduces the number of steps/actions a user has to scan in order to find what is relevant. Conditions are a great way to collect data only when required.

blocks.content: Simply define if you wish to show the current step by selecting a it as a condition of any other earlier step's value. See the image below for more detail:

blocks.caption: Here, the defined step 1.2 is not showing as it depends on 1 being checked.

blocks.imgAlt: Resulting visual feedback of condition step
blocks.caption: Once checked and validated, the step appears successfully for input.
